title: go.tools/imports: unable to override bad import guess
body:
I've got camlistore client (camlistore.org/pkg/client) code and cbfs client
(github.com/couchbaselabs/cbfs/client) packages on my system.  I'm trying to use the
latter, but goimports always removes my import of the cbfsclient and replaces it with
the camlistore client.
